entity.description: Activity that is delivered using email protocols.

attributes.name: scheduledstart
attributes.description: Enter the expected start date and time for the activity to provide details about the tentative time when the email activity must be initiated.

attributes.name: statuscode
attributes.description: Select the email's status.

constrainedList.name: email_statuscode
constrainedList.description: Reason for the status of the email activity.

attributes.name: submittedby
attributes.description: Shows the Microsoft Office Outlook account for the user who submitted the email to Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type the greeting and message text of the email.

attributes.name: to
attributes.description: Enter the account, contact, lead, queue, or user recipients for the email.

attributes.name: isworkflowcreated
attributes.description: Indication if the email was created by a workflow rule.

attributes.name: activityid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the email activity.

attributes.name: scheduledend
attributes.description: Enter the expected due date and time for the activity to be completed to provide details about when the email will be sent.

attributes.name: mimetype
attributes.description: MIME type of the email message data.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: versionnumber
attributes.description: Version number of the email message.

attributes.name: readreceiptrequested
attributes.description: Indicates that a read receipt is requested.

attributes.name: subcategory
attributes.description: Type a subcategory to identify the email type and relate the activity to a specific product, sales region, business group, or other function.

attributes.name: isbilled
attributes.description: Information regarding whether the email activity was billed as part of resolving a case.

attributes.name: actualdurationminutes
attributes.description: Type the number of minutes spent creating and sending the email. The duration is used in reporting.

attributes.name: prioritycode
attributes.description: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: actualstart
attributes.description: Enter the actual start date and time for the email. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was created, but can be edited to capture the actual time to create and send the email.

attributes.name: from
attributes.description: Enter the sender of the email.

attributes.name: directioncode
attributes.description: Select the direction of the email as incoming or outbound.

attributes.name: actualend
attributes.description: Enter the actual end date and time of the email. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was completed or canceled, but can be edited to capture the actual time to create and send the email.

attributes.name: trackingtoken
attributes.description: Shows the tracking token assigned to the email to make sure responses are automatically tracked in Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: scheduleddurationminutes
attributes.description: Scheduled duration of the email activity, specified in minutes.

attributes.name: category
attributes.description: Type a category to identify the email type, such as lead outreach, customer follow-up, or service alert, to tie the email to a business group or function.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: owningbusinessunit
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the business unit that owns the email activity.

attributes.name: bcc
attributes.description: Enter the recipients that are included on the email distribution, but are not displayed to other recipients.

attributes.name: cc
attributes.description: Enter the recipients that should be copied on the email.

attributes.name: sender
attributes.description: Sender of the email.

attributes.name: subject
attributes.description: Type a short description about the objective or primary topic of the email.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: torecipients
attributes.description: Shows the email addresses corresponding to the recipients.

attributes.name: deliveryreceiptrequested
attributes.description: Select whether the sender should receive confirmation that the email was delivered.

attributes.name: regardingobjectid
attributes.description: Choose the record that the email relates to.

attributes.name: statecode
attributes.description: Shows whether the email is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled email is read-only and can't be edited.

attributes.name: ownerid
attributes.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

attributes.name: messageid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the email message. Used only for email that is received.

attributes.name: owninguser
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns the email activity.

attributes.name: overriddencreatedon
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: importsequencenumber
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: deliveryattempts
attributes.description: Shows the count of the number of attempts made to send the email. The count is used as an indicator of email routing issues.

attributes.name: compressed
attributes.description: Indicates if the body is compressed.

attributes.name: notifications
attributes.description: Select the notification code to identify issues with the email recipients or attachments, such as blocked attachments.

items.displayName: The message was saved as a Microsoft Dynamics 365 email record, but not all the attachments could be saved with it. An attachment cannot be saved if it is blocked or if its file type is invalid.

attributes.name: timezoneruleversionnumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: utcconversiontimezonecode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: activitytypecode
attributes.description: Shows the type of activity.

attributes.name: isregularactivity
attributes.description: Information regarding whether the activity is a regular activity type or event type.

attributes.name: owningteam
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the team who owns the email activity.

attributes.name: transactioncurrencyid
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: exchangerate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: emailsender
attributes.description: Shows the sender of the email.

attributes.name: sendersaccount
attributes.description: Shows the parent account of the sender of the email.

attributes.name: attachmentcount
attributes.description: Shows the umber of attachments of the email message.

attributes.name: sendermailboxid
attributes.description: Select the mailbox associated with the sender of the email message.

attributes.name: deliveryprioritycode
attributes.description: Select the priority of delivery of the email to the email server.

constrainedList.name: activitypointer_deliveryprioritycode
constrainedList.description: Priority of delivery of the activity to the email server.

attributes.name: parentactivityid
attributes.description: Select the activity that the email is associated with.

attributes.name: inreplyto
attributes.description: Type the ID of the email message that this email activity is a response to.

attributes.name: baseconversationindexhash
attributes.description: Hash of base of conversation index.

attributes.name: conversationindex
attributes.description: Identifier for all the email responses for this conversation.

attributes.name: correlationmethod
attributes.description: Shows how an email is matched to an existing email in Microsoft Dynamics 365. For system use only.

constrainedList.name: email_correlationmethod
constrainedList.description: A value that indicates how an email is matched to an existing email in Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: senton
attributes.description: Shows the date and time that the email was sent.

attributes.name: postponeemailprocessinguntil
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: processid
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the process.

attributes.name: stageid
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the stage.

attributes.name: activityadditionalparams
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: isunsafe
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: slaid
attributes.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the email record.

attributes.name: slainvokedid
attributes.description: Last SLA that was applied to this email. This field is for internal use only.

attributes.name: onholdtime
attributes.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

attributes.name: lastonholdtime
attributes.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

attributes.name: traversedpath
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: attachmentopencount
attributes.description: Shows the number of times an email attachment has been viewed.

attributes.name: conversationtrackingid
attributes.description: Conversation Tracking Id.

attributes.name: delayedemailsendtime
attributes.description: Enter the expected date and time when email will be sent.

attributes.name: lastopenedtime
attributes.description: Shows the latest date and time when email was opened.

attributes.name: linksclickedcount
attributes.description: Shows the number of times a link in an email has been clicked.

attributes.name: opencount
attributes.description: Shows the number of times an email has been opened.

attributes.name: replycount
attributes.description: Shows the number of replies received for an email.

attributes.name: emailtrackingid
attributes.description: Email Tracking Id.

attributes.name: followemailuserpreference
attributes.description: Select whether the email allows following recipient activities sent from Microsoft Dynamics 365.This is user preference state which can be overridden by system evaluated state.

attributes.name: isemailfollowed
attributes.description: For internal use only. Shows whether this email is followed. This is evaluated state which overrides user selection of follow email.

attributes.name: emailreminderexpirytime
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when an email reminder expires.

attributes.name: emailremindertype
attributes.description: Shows the type of the email reminder.

items.displayName: If I do not receive a reply by
If the email is not opened by

attributes.name: emailreminderstatus
attributes.description: Shows the status of the email reminder.

attributes.name: emailremindertext
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: templateid
attributes.description: For internal use only. ID for template used in email.

attributes.name: reminderactioncardid
attributes.description: Reminder Action Card Id.

attributes.name: sortdate
attributes.description: Shows the date and time by which the activities are sorted.

attributes.name: isemailreminderset
attributes.description: For internal use only. Shows whether this email Reminder is Set.

attributes.name: emailsender
attributes.description: Shows the sender of the email.

attributes.name: serviceid
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the associated service.
